mapper.insert: insert into LOG_T_TELLOG ( LOG_NUM, LOG_TIME, LOG_SYS, LOG_FUN, LOG_TYPE, LOG_SQL, LOG_RESULT, LOG_MEMO, MAINKEY, LOG_GRADE, LOG_CLASS, USERID, DEAL_NUM, DEAL_TYPE, DEAL_MEMO ) values ( LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, sysdate, '电报接收系统', #{logFun}, #{logType} #{logSQL}, #{logResult}, #{logMemo}, #{mainKey}, '3', '值班', 'SYSTEM_TEL', #{deaNum}, #{dealType}, #{dealMemo} )
